bwwExcerpt: While Yazbek's jazzy score doesn't reach the heights of his work in "The Band's Visit," there are a few really terrific numbers. You won't leave "Tootsie" humming, but you will leave laughing - which is even better. Roma Torre, NY1: We may have reached the saturation point with stage adaptations of popular movies but I have to admit, "Tootsie" is quite a hoot.
